value.0:
The Salandran cleric is likely to find himself on occasion working upon the battlefield. Inventiveness and speed of action are the key elements to survival of both cleric and the wounded in this situation. 
While limb amputation can usually be achieved in the temples with a minimum of risk and with the leisure to accomplish it cleanly and with time to make a neat and painless job of the operation this is not true of the battlefield situation.
This is where the cleric will find use for a good broadsword or battle-axe to perform the surgery. Speed is of the essence here so the cleric should use a darkfire spell upon the blade to seal the wound as the amputation is performed. Evacuation of the survivors to a temple should be achieved as soon afterward as possible.
